thread.title: Dimension Development Names Paul Williamson as Vice President of Sales and Marketing

author: cnbc.com
title: Dimension Development Names Paul Williamson as Vice President of Sales and Marketing
text:
NATCHITOCHES, La., Feb. 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Dimension Development is pleased to announce Paul Williamson as Vice President of Sales & Marketing.
Mr. Williamson brings over 20+ years of progressive, successful sales leadership experience to Dimension Development. For the past 5 years, he has served as the Senior Vice President of Sales & Marketing for GF Management; responsible for overall top line performance of their hotels & resorts. Prior to this position, Williamson served as a Divisional Vice President of Sales & Marketing for Remington Hotels overseeing their Embassy Suites portfolio as well as their Hilton Focused Service Division. In addition to his multi portfolio leadership experience, Williamson has been recognized as an Award-Winning Director of Sales & Marketing earning the prestigious "Director of Sales of the Year" Award with Remington Hotels as well as being a "Director of Sales of the Year" Finalist with Hilton's Embassy Suites Brand. Throughout his career, Mr. Williamson has built high-performing, well trained sales teams, focused on exceeding budgeted expectations and improving market share position.
"I could not be more excited to join the Dimension Development family. I look forward to aligning efforts with Tim Horton and his Team and building upon a great foundation. Further, I am eager to drive a sales culture that is focused on executing impactful, direct sales campaigns, innovative digital marketing initiatives and strategic revenue management controls," said Paul Williamson.
Paul Williamson graduated from La Salle University where he earned his Bachelor of Science Degree in Marketing & Human Resource Management. Mr. Williamson has also served as a member of the Embassy Suites Owner's Marketing Advisory Committee.
Dimension Development Co . was founded in 1988, and has successfully developed, acquired and managed full-service, all-suite, and limited feature hotels. The company's various hotel partnerships have produced winning combinations in markets throughout the country. Dimension is a growth-oriented hospitality management company. Its current portfolio consists of more than 61 hotels across the US with the leading brands: Marriott International, Inc., Hilton Worldwide, Hyatt Global and Resorts and InterContinental Hotel Group.
For more information about Dimension Development Co., please visit www.dimdev.com
